articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Canada exempts Russian gas turbine from sanctions amid Europe energy crisis - The Guardian
articles.description: Ottowa defies Ukraine’s objections to return of equipment for Nord Stream 1 pipeline, saying it needs to support Europe’s access to ‘reliable and affordable energy’
articles.content: Canada will return a repaired Russian turbine to Germany that it needs for the Nord Stream 1 gas pipeline, despite objections from Ukraine, as the sanctions regime came up against the energy crisis s… [+2780 chars]
